verses.verse: For the conclusion. A Psalm for the sons of Kore. Clap your hands, all ye nations; shout to God with a triumphant voice:
for the Lord Most High is awful; a great king over all the earth.
He hath subjected tribes to us, nations also under our feet.
He hath chosen for us his inheritance the excellency of Jacob which he loved.
God ascended at the triumphant shout; the Lord, at the trumpet's sounding.
O sing praises to our God; sing praises. Sing praises to our king; sing praises.
Since God is king of the whole earth; sing praises with understanding.
God hath commenced his reign over the nations: God is seated on his holy throne.
The heads of families assembled with the God of Abraham. Because the mighties of the land belong to God, they have been exceedingly exalted.
